relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress, conversant and interactive.
relevant_findings.heent: Sclerae anicteric, mucous membranes moist, oropharynx is clear.
relevant_findings.neck: Trachea is midline, thyroid unremarkable, no palpable cervical lymphadenopathy, no visible jugular venous distension.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no audible murmurs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Respirations are unlabored on room air.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, minimally and appropriately tender to palpation, no rebound or guarding, nontympanitic, normoactive bowel sounds, no palpable masses, dressings over incisions are clean and dry.
relevant_findings.extremities: No lower extremity edema, distal extremities feel warm and appear well-perfused.
